Method Detail

createIndexWriter

private boolean createIndexWriter(java.lang.String extension)
Create Lucene index writer.

Parameters:
extension - Extension of file to index if extension="img", the indexes will be stored in "ImgIndex" directory else "WebIndex"
Returns:
true, if successful true : if Indexer#writer is initialized else false
See Also:
indexData(File, String, String, float), updatePageRank(HashMap)

indexData

public boolean indexData(java.io.File f,
                         java.lang.String url,
                         java.lang.String extension,
                         float pageRank)
                  throws java.io.IOException
Function of indexing data.

Parameters:
f - File which will be indexed
url - Url of the file
extension - extension of the file
pageRank - the page rank of the page
Returns:
true if indexing was successful
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
See Also:
TikaParser.getItems(File)

updatePageRank

public void updatePageRank(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> map)
                    throws java.io.IOException
Function of updating the Lucene document page rank.

Parameters:
map - Key:String url of page ; Value:Double the page rank coefficient
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
